data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Mirpur Khas to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mirpur Khas, Sind, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Mirpur Khas. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, help the 652 believers in Mirpur Khas to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Mirpur Khas a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput Bais (Muslim traditions) people.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 652 believers in Mirpur Khas, Sind, Pakistan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 652 believers in the county of Mirpur Khas.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mirpur Khas, Sind, Pakistan has a population of 234,000.

We estimate Mirpur Khas has 652 people who might know Jesus, 2,340 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 231,008 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Mirpur Khas, Sind, Pakistan.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”
